rows.label: bf11070100_0010
rows.name: How sad... That village, I mean.

rows.label: bf11070100_0040
rows.name: He didn't do that, did he?

rows.label: bf11070100_0050
rows.name:
The towns razed by the Holy Grail
were completely obliterated...

rows.label: bf11070100_0060
rows.name: I plan to inform the mercenaries of this.

rows.label: bf11070100_0070
rows.name: How could a person do something so awful...?

rows.label: bf11070100_0080
rows.name:
Anyway. You should rest. 
We should be able to meet up with Kasumi tomorrow.

rows.label: bf11070100_0100
rows.name:
I wonder if she's found any leads on Mother.
I hope so, anyway.

rows.label: bf11070100_0110
rows.name: I'll prepare food, then rest up.
